sections.heading: Exemption.Section 513.2 - Power of commissioner.
sections.text:
513.1 Exemption.

Unless specific reference is made thereto, no provision of this subtitle shall include or apply to domestic societies which limit their membership to the employees of: 1. A particular city or2. A designated firm, business house, or corporation.[C24, 27, 31, 35, 39, ยง

8894;

C46, 50, 54, 58, 62, 66, 71, 73, 75, 77, 79, 81, ยง513.1] Sat Dec 23 00:43:29 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 513.1 (14, 0)

sections.heading: Power of commissioner.
sections.text:
513.2 Power of commissioner.

The commissioner of insurance may require from any society such information as will enable the commissioner to determine whether such society is exempt from the provisions ofthe laws relating to insurance or to fraternal benefit societies. [C24, 27, 31, 35, 39, ยง

8895;

C46, 50, 54, 58, 62, 66, 71, 73, 75, 77, 79, 81, ยง513.2] Sat Dec 23 00:43:30 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 513.2 (14, 0)
